attributes.action: Chefs to combat obesity & to inspire healthier eating through schools & colleges
attributes.additional_details:
To provide funding and access for trained credible chefs to be able to access schools & colleges to develop & deliver:

* a national programme to combat obesity
* educate towards a lifelong and sustainable healthy eating plan
* a lasting impact on peoples values towards healthy eating and cooking

A well structured, government backed campaign to filter out to young people and their families in order to educate and inspire health related eating and cooking for all.
